    • Method Detail

      • environment

        public EnvironmentBuilder<MYSELF> environment()
        Configures environment for the builder (and sub-builders). Environment consists of configuration properties/values that are used to configure the system (see EnvironmentBuilder for more information). You can use system properties: 
         .environment()
    .systemProperties();
        Or, you can load properties from a file: 
         .environment()
    .properties("/path/to/file.properties")
        Or using directly a Properties object: 
         Properties myprops = new Properties();
 myprops.setProperty("foo", "bar");
 .environment()
    .properties(myprops)
        Or defining directly properties: 
         .environment()
    .properties()
       .set("foo", "bar")

        If no environment was previously used, it creates a new one. Then each time you call environment(), the same instance is used.

        Returns:
        the builder to configure properties handling

      • environment

        public MYSELF environment(EnvironmentBuilder<?> builder)
        NOTE: this is mostly for advance usage (when creating a custom module). Inherits environment configuration from another builder. This is useful for configuring independently different parts of Ogham but keeping a whole coherence (see DefaultFreemarkerEmailConfigurer for an example of use). The same instance is shared meaning that all changes done here will also impact the other builder.

        If a previous builder was defined (by calling environment() for example), the new builder will override it.

        Parameters:
        builder - the builder to inherit
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent chaining

      • resolverAdapter

        public MYSELF resolverAdapter(TemplateLoaderAdapter adapter)
        Ogham provides a generic resource resolution mechanism (ResourceResolver). Freemarker uses its own template resolution mechanism (TemplateLoader). A resolver adapter (TemplateLoaderAdapter) is the way to transform a ResourceResolver into a TemplateLoader.

        Ogham provides and registers default resolver adapters but you may need to use a custom ResourceResolver. So you also need to provide the corresponding TemplateLoaderAdapter.

        Parameters:
        adapter - the resolver adapter
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent chaining

      • configuration

        public FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder<MYSELF> configuration()
        Fluent configurer for Freemarker configuration.
        Returns:
        the fluent builder for Freemarker configuration object

      • configuration

        public MYSELF configuration(freemarker.template.Configuration configuration)
        Sets a Freemarker configuration. This value preempts any other value defined by calling configuration() method. If this method is called several times, only the last provider is used.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the Freemarker configuration
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent chaining

      • classLoader

        public MYSELF classLoader(ClassLoader classLoader)
        Set the ClassLoader to use for loading classpath resources.

        Loading resources from classpath requires a ClassLoader. Several class loaders may be defined in an application to isolate parts of the application. FreeMarker requires you to provide a ClassLoader for finding resources in the classpath. This is done for security reasons.

        By default, Ogham uses the current thread class loader.

        Parameters:
        classLoader - the class loader to use
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent chaining
